definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: Rothschild's centre of gravity is being pushed and pulled towards east Asia.
sentences.chinese: 受多方面原因影響，洛希爾的重心正在向東亞轉移。

sentences.english: Rothschild is revelling in the fruits of its conservatism.
sentences.chinese: 洛希爾醉心於保守理念帶來的甜頭兒。

sentences.english: The rest of the shares were newly issued by Rothschild.
sentences.chinese: 中行收購的其餘股份爲洛希爾發行的新股。
